fields.text: Do you want to start the next hand?
Can be changed any time and take effect immediately.

fields.label: Show points (hearts plus queen of spades) during round?
Autoscore after each round (when click Next Hand buttton)?
Shoot the moon reduces own score by 26 (rather than increase opponents' scores)?

info.name: Hearts
info.attribution:
Board layout by LawDawg and released to public domain (CC0).

Library icon by Skoll under CC BY 3.0: https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/hearts.html
info.description: Classic trick-taking card game where players try to avoid taking hearts and the queen of spades. When one player reaches agreed maximum score, player with fewest points wins.
